## Welcome!

I am currently a Postdoc at Stockholm University, working on the
[DEMCOOP-
project](https://www.su.se/english/research/research-catalogue/research-projects/b/democracy-autocracy-and-international-cooperation-demcoop),
led by Jonas Tallberg. Before coming to Stockholm, I received my PhD
from the University of Oslo for my dissertation "Patterns of minister
turnover across regime types" in 2024.

My current research focuses primarily on **the effects of regime type on international cooperation**, **the interplay of political institutions and elites**, and **autocratic politics**. My
work on these topics has been published in journals such as
*Perspectives on Politics*, *Democratization*, and *Political Studies.*

<!-- Feel free to write multiple paragraphs. Quarto supports full Markdown. -->



### Interests

-   The interplay of political institutions and elites
-   Autocratic politics
-   International cooperation
